tweet: Don't let the Herd leave you behind!  Apply to Marshall today at www.marshall.edu.
Mu Recruiters will be out making high school visit in December! Ask a counselor when we will be stopping in at your school.
Sarah has a bag full of applications.  I may be holding the Class of 2014!
Hey WV! Recruitment Coordinators are making visits to high schools around the state. Ask your counselor when an MU rep will be near you!
Rebecca will be in Atlantic City, NJ at the Convention Center on Thursday, Nov. 11th at the National College Fair. Stop by and say hi!
